biography.firstP: In professional transition following the onset of a disability, my investigative profile and penchant for problem-solving led me to venture into the field of web development.
biography.secondP: Recently graduated from a Professional Training in Web Development (level 5) at CCI de Roanne with Garage404, I now aim to affirm my skills and continue my understanding and learning in this domain by joining a technical and human project that values diversity of talents. Despite the constraint of not being able to stand for extended periods, my mobility and adaptability remain my strengths.
biography.thirdP: Therefore, I am open to any proposition that allows me to contribute my value to a company while evolving alongside it.
